name: Mabware
description:
I just downloaded GDevelop after the jam started 6 hours earlier, so I made this game without any time nor practice at all!

There's really nothing much. I only managed to squeeze in 2 minigames and it's extremely buggy, but I say that it's an accomplishment! I also squeezed in a little bit of story in there at the end.

Hope you somewhat like it.

I might polish it and add some more old school minigames in it someday.

Liluo.io Link
